text:
1. The ability to specify img loading attribute for image CTAs (e.g. lazy)
2. The ability to specify a unique attribute in a repeater / repeating field group (e.g. if I have a repeater group of Tags and CTA fields, require Tag be unique). I don't think this is possible with the regex validation and if it is, the help icon for the regex option in the UI doesn't go anywhere.
3. A `debug` or `tail` option for the HubSpot CLI to either stream to a file or stdout. The current debugging experience is really hard to deal with - having to go to the page with a query parameter and go to the HTML to try and find an issue.
Or on another note â€” being able to access language variants of global modules would also be a solution.
